verses.verse: At <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2729>trembles,<s%> and is <S%H5425>moved<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H8085>attentively<s%> the <S%H7267>noise<s%> of his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and the <S%H1899>sound<s%> that <S%H3318>goes<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
He <S%H3474>directs<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and his <S%H216>lightning<s%> to the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> it a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7580>roars:<s%> he <S%H7481>thunders<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1347>excellency;<s%> and he will not <S%H6117>stay<s%> them <S%H3588>when<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
<S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7481>thunders<s%> <S%H6381>marvelously<s%> with his <S%H6963>voice;<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> things <S%H6213>does<s%> he, which we <S%H408>cannot<s%> <S%H3045>comprehend.<s%>

For he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7950>snow,<s%> Be you on the <S%H776>earth;<s%> likewise to the small <S%H1653>rain,<s%> and to the <S%H4306>great<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> of his <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
He <S%H2856>seals<s%> up the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man;<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H4639>work.<s%>
Then the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H1119>into<s%> <S%H695>dens,<s%> and <S%H7931>remain<s%> in their <S%H4585>places.<s%>
Out of the <S%H2315>south<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind:<s%> and <S%H7135>cold<s%> out of the <S%H4215>north.<s%>
By the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7140>frost<s%> is <S%H5414>given:<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> is <S%H4164>straitened.<s%>
<S%H637>Also<s%> by <S%H7377>watering<s%> he <S%H2959>wearies<s%> the thick <S%H5645>cloud:<s%> he <S%H6327>scatters<s%> his <S%H216>bright<s%> <S%H6051>cloud:<s%>

And it is <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H4524>round<s%> about by his <S%H8458>counsels:<s%> that they may <S%H6467>do<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H6680>commands<s%> them on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He causes it to <S%H4672>come,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> for <S%H7626>correction,<s%> or for his <S%H776>land,<s%> or for <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>
<S%H238>Listen<s%> to <S%H2063>this,<s%> O <S%H347>Job:<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5975>still,<s%> and <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works of <S%H410>God.<s%>
Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> when <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H7760>disposed<s%> them, and caused the <S%H216>light<s%> of his <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3313>shine?<s%>
Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4657>balancing<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> the <S%H4652>wondrous<s%> works of him which is <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in <S%H1843>knowledge?<s%>
<S%H834>How<s%> your <S%H899>garments<s%> are <S%H2525>warm,<s%> when he <S%H8252>quiets<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by the <S%H1864>south<s%> wind?
Have you with him <S%H7554>spread<s%> out the <S%H7834>sky,<s%> which is <S%H2389>strong,<s%> and as a <S%H3332>molten<s%> <S%H7209>looking<s%> <S%H7209>glass?<s%>
<S%H3045>Teach<s%> us <S%H4100>what<s%> we shall <S%H559>say<s%> to him; for we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6186>order<s%> our speech by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
Shall it be <S%H5608>told<s%> him that I <S%H1696>speak?<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> he shall be <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up.

And <S%H6258>now<s%> men <S%H7200>see<s%> not the <S%H925>bright<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is in the <S%H7834>clouds:<s%> but the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5674>passes,<s%> and <S%H2891>cleans<s%> them.
<S%H2091>Fair<s%> <S%H2091>weather<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north:<s%> with <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H1935>majesty.<s%>

Touching the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him out: he is <S%H7689>excellent<s%> in <S%H3581>power,<s%> and in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and in <S%H7230>plenty<s%> of <S%H6666>justice:<s%> he will not <S%H6031>afflict.<s%>
<S%H582>Men<s%> do <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> him: he <S%H7200>respects<s%> not any that are <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
